reviewText: BLU RAY!FLAT SCREEN TVS!WISH THE VIDEO WAS ON BLU RAY.
A great way to relive Olympic memories.  It's hard to remember the stars of past Olympics unless you go back and review these tapes.

Figure Skating coverage includes the following complete programs:
Evgeni Plushenko SP, LP
Shawn Sawyer SP, LP
Jeffery Buttle SP, LP
Emanuel Sandhu SP, LP
Joannie Rochette SP, LP
Mira Leung SP, LP
Irina Slutskaya SP, LP
Shizuka Arakawa SP, LP
Sasha Cohen SP, LP
Dube & Davison SP, LP
Maroux & Buntin SP, LP
Totmiyanina & Marinin SP, LP
Zhang & Zhang LP
Wing & Lowe OD, FD
Dubreuil & Lazon OD, FD
Navka & Kostomarov OD, FD
Fusar-Poli & Margaglio OD
Belbin & Agosto FD
Video quality looks great up converted on my hdtv.
